name: EMP
info: A Sinner adept at Long-Distance Output. Can deal Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.
criminalRecord:
The culprit of the Syndicate seven-day blackout in half of Syndicate, largely paralyzing circuits and communications, causing economic losses of hundreds of millions of DisCoins and indirect accidental losses that cannot be estimated.

--

The background check reveals that the subject has a plain personal history with no parts worth highlighting. Despite that, she's managed to survive the chaotic Syndicate with her eloquence and bluffing skills. The subject once admitted that she felt reassured now that she was in MBCC and no longer had to spend every day in fear and worry. Awakened during an emergency, her ability has versatile uses and is handy on various missions.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Chose to use the composite bow for the sake of its handsome look, which can shoot arrows formed by the subject's powers that trigger a range of magnetic storms and deal electromagnetic shock after hitting a target.

+++* Awakening Signs
The subject's gang was besieged by the Legion, which accidentally awakened the subject's ability when trying to survive.

+++* Corruption State
The subject is in good physical condition. No signs of infection except for some mild muscle atrophy due to lack of exercise.
ecbFlavourText: "Even I have moments when I want to make an effort."
arrestRec1: The subject was hired to infiltrate the Syndicate's war and faced the Sinner squad after escaping. When the subject realized how dire the situation was, the subject immediately revealed the identity of the Sinners and surrendered.
arrestRec2: Five to six versions have been circulating within the Bureau about the subject's background, such as a genius orphan, a family heir, and a penniless tycoon. After investigation, the the subject was just an ordinary Syndicate orphan abandoned during the riots.
arrestRec3: A junior member of the gang who passively carries out missions. Repeated joined other gangs later because of the fear of death and relied heavily on bluffing to survive.
arrestRec4: Due to the bluffing of the subject's own strength, the companions have high expectations at the critical moment. The subject had no choice but to shoot an arrow into the sky, which accidentally awakened the subject, causing a major blackout within the city. The residents successfully evacuated at night.
servingTerm1: The subject quickly accepted the arrest and basically continued the habits of gang life â€” sleeping and waking up late, addicted to anime and video games, rarely out on missions, and extremely unresponsive to fights.
servingTerm2: Claims to have unmatched archery skills, but always finds an excuse to slip away when challenged. Without the use of her powers, she managed to shoot off the target fives times for 70m shots and twice for 10m targets.
servingTerm3: Despite the target's easy-going and outgoing personality, her reputation isn't great among friends and acquaintances. The subject has no filter with close friends and was described as "socially awkward" by her best Sinner friends.
servingTerm4: Often deliberately talks strangely in front of the Chief to attract the Chief's attention and promote her favorite anime: BoBo's Adventure.
emotionCheck1:
[In the training facility, EMP seems happy.]

**EMP:** Humph. Today, I'll allow you to look at my magnificent face and admire it.

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Well then, Uncrowned Ruler, what will we be doing today?
 * **EMP:** Of course, we are going to play some games! Whether it's poker, dice, or mahjong. I'm fine with anything!
 * **EMP:** ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜

* **Prompt:** ...If you keep up with this lackadaisical attitude, I'll send you to [[[the Rust]]] for missions.
 * **EMP:** Eek! Just kidding... I'm just kidding!
 * **EMP:** ğŸ˜«ğŸ˜«

supervision1:
++* âš  A Scam Call

//The Chief received a scam call.//

**System Notifications:** The Chief's office received a scam call. EMP happened to be there to pick up the phone and managed to scam the scammer with a bunch of nonsense.

* **Prompt:** Commend her

**EMP:** Hey, Chief, do you think I can make a living out of this?
supervision2:
++* âš  It's a Trap

//Everyone is gathering around to play truth or dare.//

**System Notifications:** People are playing truth or dare in the Bureau. When EMP is asked to choose either manga or video games, she chooses death.

* **Prompt:** Say nothing
supervision3:
++* âš  Manga

//EMP finds you, looking all sneaky. It seems she wants to speak with you.//

**System Notifications:** EMP keeps complaining to you that she thinks there aren't enough manga books in the library. She is missing out on the latest chapters.

* **Prompt:** Buy the latest manga
supervision4:
++* âš  Too Close For Comfort

//The Supervision Center tends to show snow screen with static noise lately.//

**System Notifications:** The Supervision Center's surveillance equipment has been upgraded, but it always shows a warning message saying there's something wrong with the electric and magnetic signals. After some checking and troubleshooting, it was eventually discovered that the new equipment is so sensitive that it is disturbed by EMP's power.

* **Prompt:** Let EMP discharge some more electricity.

**System Notifications:** Everyone is happy that there is now an electric charger in human shape.
supervision5:
++* âš âš  Invalid Leave Request

//The Chief received a new request.//

**System Notifications:** Chief, you have a new request.

**EMP:** Chief. Cough cough. May I take a day off from today's training?

**Chief:** But you've already taken all your leaves for the month in the first week.

**EMP:** I took leaves in the first week because I was allergic to pollens...

**Chief:** If I recall correctly, I approved your leave request last week as well.

**EMP:** That was because I got injured in a mission. Chief, you saw it too. There was a HUGE scratch on my arm!

**Chief:** ...Then what is your reason this time?

**EMP:** I have a sore throat. Cough cough. I think I might have caught a cold.

* **Prompt:** ...Is that right?
* **Prompt:** Are you sure?

**Chief:** But I saw you talking to the others in the Recreation Area. You seemed excited about the latest updates of Bobo's Bizarre Adventure.

**EMP:** I'm sorry, Chief! I'll start the training right away!
supervision6:
++* âš âš  Switching Weapons

//The Chief received a new request.//

**System Notifications:** Chief, you have a new request.

**EMP:** Chief, may I have a new weapon?

**EMP:** I'm really clumsy with bows and arrows.

**Chief:** Of course. What new weapon would you like?

**EMP:** Well... something cooler?

**Chief:** Cooler... like Wendy's chainsaw?

**EMP:** Well, I think that is a bit too brutal...

**Chief:** What about Demolia's hammer then?

**EMP:** Nah, I can't even lift it up.

**Chief:** Joan's guitar?

**EMP:** I don't play instruments...

**Chief:** How about you tear down a water pipe just like Hella?

**EMP:** That is no weapon at all!

* **Prompt:** Do you want to switch weapons or not?
* **Prompt:** What is it that you want, then?

**EMP:** Well, forget it. I guess I'll just have to make do with my bow and arrows.
supervision7:
++* âš âš  Importance of BGM

//The player doesn't seem to be playing the right music.//

**System Notifications:** Something's wrong with the music player. EMP is the first suspect that comes to your mind.

**EMP:** Chief, you want to see me again?

**Chief:** I don't want to see you every day, but you simply won't stop causing me trouble.

**EMP:** What? What did I do? I have been behaving myself.

**Chief:** Think about it. What did you do to my music player?

**EMP:** ...Oh, you mean that?

**EMP:** It's some background music that I prepared just for you!

**EMP:** The previous soundtracks aren't so bad, but they are nothing compared to my //Song of Dis//.

**EMP:** You've heard it too. Doesn't it make you feel excited, exhilarated, and hyped?

**EMP:** This soundtrack is made for you, Chief. You are a valiant, dauntless, charismatic hero!

**Chief:** ...

* **Prompt:** Flattery doesn't work on me.
* **Prompt:** Fine. But I won't allow it again.
supervision8:
++* âš âš âš  Emperor of the DisCity

//You hear EMP bluffing to Sinners new to the bureau.//

**System Notifications:** EMP is chit-chatting with a new Sinner.

**EMP:** That's right. I'm the Archer Queen of Syndicate. If you want my autograph, line up over there and draw a number.

**EMP:** What? You've never heard of that name? Well, you must be really ignorant. Have you heard of the DisCity's Hundred Days' Power Outage? Yes, that's my doing.

* **Prompt:** Keep listening
 * **EMP:** Oh, no need for the applause. Destruction of this scale doesn't even take 1% of my strength.
 * **EMP:** Before, when I practiced with the Legion Commander Zoya, we tied after a tough fight. But in fact, I let her win on purpose.
* **Prompt:** Keep listening
 * **EMP:** Don't let that shock you! Zoya is merely one of my many powerful friends.
 * **EMP:** As for my most glorious deed, it'd be leading Chief on a dangerous mission and crushing the first Black Ring of the DisCity with my bare hands!
 * **EMP:** Ever since then, everyone has been calling me the //Emperor of the DisCity//.
 * **EMP:** Oh, Chief? You're here too.
 * **EMP:** I've got some matters to attend to. Guess I'll stop wasting your time. Gotta go now, hehe.
 * **System Notifications:** EMP darts off quickly.

* **Prompt:** Expose EMP
 * **EMP:** Oh, Chief? You're here too.
 * **EMP:** I've got some matters to attend to. Guess I'll stop wasting your time. Gotta go now, hehe.
 * **System Notifications:** EMP darts off quickly.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Do you know who you just captured? I... I'm the uncrowned queen of the Syndicate, the killer marksman of the toughest gang! Ahhh, don't hit me, please! I'll cooperate! I'll do anything you want!

[Raise to Phase 1]
I told you a long time ago, I'm the strongest. Hey! Listen to me!

[Raise to Phase 3]
EMP evolvesâ€”â€”into ultimate EMP!

[Level Start]
Chief... after you.

[Win Battles]
Hmph. All thanks to invincible me.

[Lose Battles]
Bad luck... it was just bad luck!

[Ultimate Skill]
You... you forced me to do this!

[Die in Battles]
Chief... think of something...

[Greeting]
Huh? Oh, it's Chief? What do you want to play today? Poker? Dice? Mahjong? You don't want to play? Don't be so uptight. Doing nothing is boring!

[Conversation 1]
Chief, want to go to the Syndicate with me? Don't worry, with me there, no one will dare mess with us! Oh, right! Remember to take the Bureau's car.

[Conversation 2]
If someone is looking for me and mentions something about repaying a debt... please cover for me, Chief. I might as well be dead if those loan sharks find me.

[Conversation 3]
Ahhh, Chief, can you give me the comic book from that shelf? Not that one, that one. No, not that one... eh, forget it. You sit. I'll do it myself.

[Special Conversation 1]
A blackout? Yes, I did that! Impressed? I singlehandedly cut the Syndicate's power for a week! Aren't I amazing? Oh please praise me... please...

[Special Conversation 2]
I'm delicate, and I love to chat and gossip. I'm not really good at anything, and I always seem to annoy everyone. You must get a headache from meeting someone like me... haha... thank you...

[Special Conversation 3]
Shush! Be quiet! I'm practicing archery! Oh... someday, I will be able to effortlessly hit the target!

[Full Compliance]
Actually, the name I used before EMP is Emy Pan... oh, it's nothing. It's just that... I'm really happy to meet you, Chief.

[Idle]
Chief! Chief! Chief! Talk to me! Nobody is chatting with me! I'd die! Really! Really! Chief...

[Annoyed]
Ahhhh! You can't be serious, Chief! You'd really do this to someone as grotesque as me? Spare me..

[Special Attention]
Oh Chief, I didn't expect you to remember me! Since you came, have a seat and let's chat! I'm bored to death over here...

[Dispatch]
One of my favorite things to do is saying "no" to arrogant guys... just kidding! I'll go, I'll go...

[Dispatch Complete]
EMP, glorious return!

[Level Up]
Combat power should exceed 5 by now!
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
After encountering the Uncrowned Queen in a dark alley, your first instinct is to walk towards me instead of running away. Now that's something you don't see every day! You've earned EMP's admiration. Cough up your name.

[Greeting]
Come on, let's go take a walk around the block. Hey don't worry, no one in Syndicate would dare pick on EMP. By the way, you... walk in front of me.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
That... Minos Bureau of Crisis Control you mentioned, what do they usually do? Ah, it's fine, don't be nervous. As the boss, I just want to know how much mettle my underling's got!

[Ordinary Contact 2]
I've resolved all the disorders around here lately! Now the only thing that interests me in scamming... Um, I mean, training talented people with great potential like you! You should keep learning from me!

[Idle] 
You see her? Next time you meet her, remember to call her Big Sis. Even though she's only a few months old, she's also a founding member of the gang! You must show her the respect she deserves.

[Annoyed]
You've only been here for a few days and you've forgotten your place already?

[Special Attention] 
I haven't seen that little thug with the water pipe in a while. I took a heavy blow from her last time and I haven't fully recovered... If I see her again, I must repay her properly.

[Level Up}
Where are you going... The West District? Ahem, um... Nothing, I choked on something... But, are... are you sure? That's the Legion's territory.
attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
Thou hast discovered my secret... Then stay here with me forever! C'mon, quit gawking! This is the time for you to say, "In your dream, Dreadlord! Not even over my dead body!"

[Greeting]
Hey, you're just in time to see the love of my life. Isn't it a masterpiece? Great storyboard and plot, right? What? The love of my life wasn't this one last time we met? Ummm... Well, I just made the mistake that all manga otaku make! 

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Ta-da! Check my babies out! This room of comics is the kingdom I have built for myself! Many are already out-of-print! Thanks to these treasures, I can usurp... ahem, I mean, achieve this lofty status in the comic club!

[Ordinary Contact 2]
If you sincerely want to read it, it's not like I can't lend it to you, but strings attached: first, you can't soil the fold-outs; second, you can't lend it to anyone else; and third, next time I have to go stand in line to buy some special edition comic books, you will approve my leave permit.

[Idle] 
It's the guy posting spoilers again! I have reported so many times but no use! This forum is garbage! Arghhhhh! You left me with no choice but to do this! Just wait and see, your server is gone!

[Annoyed]
"Hands off" is rule No.1 of the adventure code, okay? If you continue to be harum-scarum, you might trigger the spell sealed in my equipment. Humph, that'll be fun to watch!

[Special Attention] 
It's not that I'm stingy, but this is a random special edition that came with the limited color illustration! And I had to buy two other unsalable books to get it. I swore I'd never let it fall into the hands of outsiders!

[Level Up}
Hehe, see this shining magic tattoo? I am not bald, and I get stronger!
nightmareTalent: All allied units gain a 25% CRIT Damage boost.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Passing Fad
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: CRIT Damage +20%/25%/30%. The maximum number of [Ultra EM Arrow!]'s refreshes when it kills an enemy is increased from 1 to 2.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText: "Even I have moments when I want to make an effort."

crimebrandSets.name: Normal Attack Buff
crimebrandSets.note: Deal increased normal attack damage. Good because of EMP's long range. You can move her close to the enemy to ult to benefit from Solo Dance even more.

crimebrandSets.name: Energy Damage
crimebrandSets.note: Generate more energy and increase crit rate and crit damage.

shackles.title: One Stone, Two Birds
shackles.description: [Ultra EM Arrow!] deals extra 50% Physical Damage, to all enemies in the target grid. (This damage doesn't have CRIT bonus)

shackles.title: Bull's Eye
shackles.description: Killing an enemy makes the next [Ultra EM Arrow!] a CRIT hit.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Electric Arrow
skills.description: EMP shoots electric arrows with a recurve bow. The 1st and 2nd hits: She shoots an arrow, dealing (128% of Attack damage) Physical Damage. The 3rd hit: She shoots 2 arrows in a row, each dealing (85% of Attack damage) Physical Damage.

upgrade.description: The first and second hits damage multipliers are increased to $0% , and the third hit damage multiplier is increased to $0%.

skills.name: Ultra EM Arrow!
skills.description: EMP unleashes the Archer Queen of Syndicate's raw power. She shoots a lethal arrow at the enemy with the lowest HP percentage on a single grid, dealing (800% of Attack damage) Physical Damage and 1 Core Damage. [Ultra EM Arrow!] can create a CRIT. The CRIT effect is determined by EMP's CRIT Rate and CRIT Damage bonus.

skills.name: Double Arrow
skills.description: The charge of [Ultra EM Arrow!] is refreshed when it scores a kill. The effect has a 45-second cooldown.

skills.name: Hypercharge
skills.description: For each enemy she kills, EMP gains a 1% Attack bonus. The bonus lasts for the whole battle, and can stack up to 6 times.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Attack +6
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +6, Unlock Requirements: Dispatch Amy Pan 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Emp's  Shackle Sync Rate increased to 5
Unlock the Voice: The Full Compliance, the King of the Mouth is strong

voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: If you sincerely want to read it, it's not like I can't lend it to you, but strings attached: first, you can't soil the fold-outs; second, you can't lend it to anyone else; and third, the next time I have to go stand in line to buy some special edition comic books, you will approve my leave permit.
